title: Calories in Sesame Seeds
meta_description: Learn calories in sesame seeds per 100g, with detailed nutrition facts including protein, fats, carbs, fiber, and easy tweaks for recipes.
assumptions: Unhulled, dry roasted sesame seeds; no added salt or oil.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by type (hulled/black), processing, brand, and storage; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 100 g of sesame seeds provide ~573 kcal, 18 g protein, and 50 g healthy fats.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Roasted with 1 tsp oil per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in 100 g of sesame seeds?
What is the protein content in sesame seeds?
Are sesame seeds high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, around 50 g total fat per 100 g, mostly unsaturated.

faqs.q: How much fiber do sesame seeds have?
faqs.a: Roughly 12 g dietary fiber per 100 g.

faqs.q: Calories in 1 tablespoon of sesame seeds?
faqs.a: About 52 kcal for 1 tbsp (9 g); scale from 100 g values.
